Wisdom: احْذَرْ مُجَالَسَةَ الْجَاهِلِ كَمَا تَأْمَنُ مِنْ مُصَاحَبَةِ الْعَاقِلِ
enWisdom: Be just as wary of sitting in the company of the ignorant, as you would be at ease in the company of the intelligent

Wisdom: إِذَا أَحْبَبْتَ السَّلَامَةَ فَاجْتَنِبْ مُصَاحَبَةَ الْجَهُولِ
enWisdom: If you like to remain safe, then keep away from the companionship of a foolish person
How bad a colleague the ignoramus is!
The friend of an ignorant person is exposed to harm
The worst person you can accompany is an ignorant one
The worst companion is an ignorant person
The friend of an ignorant person is troubled and afflicted
Cutting off [ties with] the ignorant is equivalent to establishing ties with the intelligent

Wisdom: مَنْ جَالَسَ الْجُهَّالَ فَلْيَسْتَعِدَّ لِلْقِيلِ وَالْقَالِ
enWisdom: One whose company is good will have many companions

Wisdom: مِنْ عَدَمِ الْعَقْلِ مُصَاحَبَةُ ذَوِي الْجَهْلِ
enWisdom: One of the conditions of faith is [having] good companionship with one’s brothers
Being in the company of an ignorant person is one of the greatest tribulations

Wisdom: لَا تُوَادُّوا الْكَافِرَ وَلَا تُصَاحِبُوا الْجَاهِلَ
enWisdom: Do not befriend the disbeliever and do not accompany the ignorant
